mapper.select: select count(*) from user_tables where table_name='FASP_T_PUBMENU'
mapper.update: create table FASP_T_PUBMENU ( GUID VARCHAR2(50) not null, LEVELNO NUMBER(1), ISLEAF NUMBER(1), STATUS CHAR(1), CODE VARCHAR2(200), NAME VARCHAR2(200), PARENTID VARCHAR2(50), URL VARCHAR2(1000), MENUORDER NUMBER(5), REMARK VARCHAR2(255), DBVERSION TIMESTAMP(6), APPSYSID NUMBER(4), PROVINCE VARCHAR2(9), YEAR CHAR(4), APPID VARCHAR2(50), PARAM1 VARCHAR2(255), PARAM2 VARCHAR2(255), PARAM3 VARCHAR2(255), PARAM4 VARCHAR2(255), PARAM5 VARCHAR2(255), SSOFLAG CHAR(1), ADMINTYPE NUMBER(1), ALIAS VARCHAR2(100), ISPTADMIN CHAR(1), ADMDIV VARCHAR2(50) )
